column2: 1. Selection of Essential Services to be Included in Analysis

column4: IPTp - Intermittent preventive treatment of malaria during pregnancy
Iron and folate supplementation in pregnancy
Antibiotics for preterm or prolonged PROM
Active management of third stage of labor (AMTSL)
Removal of retained products of conception
Induction of labor for pregnancies lasting 41+ weeks
Full supportive care for neonatal sepsis/pneumonia
Vitamin A for treatment of measles
ACTs - Artemisinin compounds for treatment of malaria
SAM - treatment for severe acute malnutrition
MAM - treatment for moderate acute malnutrition
